001package gbw.melange.events.observability.filters;
002
003import gbw.melange.common.events.observability.IFallibleBiConsumer;
004import gbw.melange.common.events.observability.filters.IFallibleFilterChain;
005
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import java.util.Collection;
008
009/**
010 * <p>FallibleFilterChain class.</p>
011 *
012 * @author GustavBW
013 * @version $Id: $Id
014 */
015public class FallibleFilterChain<T> extends FilterChain<T, IFallibleBiConsumer<T>>
016        implements IFallibleFilterChain<T, Integer> {
017
018    /**
019     * <p>Constructor for FallibleFilterChain.</p>
020     */
021    protected FallibleFilterChain(){}
022
023    /** {@inheritDoc} */
024    @Override
025    public void run(T old, T newer) throws Exception {
026        for(FilterIdPair pair : filters){
027            pair.filter().accept(old, newer);
028        }
029    }
030
031    /** {@inheritDoc} */
032    @Override
033    public Collection<Exception> runAllowExceptions(T old, T newer) {
034        Collection<Exception> issues = new ArrayList<>();
035        for(FilterIdPair pair : filters){
036            try{
037                pair.filter().accept(old, newer);
038            }catch (Exception returned){
039                issues.add(returned);
040            }
041        }
042        return issues;
043    }
044
045}
